entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.2°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
